text: (upbeat music)
- My name is Ann Knight.
I'm an Inside Sales Representative.

I was definitely surprised by
some things when I started.
One of the preconceptions that I had

when I first came to AWS is
that it's a huge organization
and it's easy to get lost.
(upbeat music)

One of the things that I think
really helps me right now
is the sense of community.

One of the organizations
that I am involved in
is the Black Employee Network,

and this gives us the
opportunity to come together
and to really, again, create a community.

There are some really great
individuals that work for AWS.
One of the things that I really appreciate
is just being able to be candid
and to have those open conversations,
from your managers to your peers,

and really get the support
that you need throughout.
So I really love my experience with AWS.
It's been great.
